author: iSazonov
body:
After update to 1.18.0 VS Code show the error `The preLaunchTask 'xxxx' cannot be tracked.` if we try to build.

Releated Issue https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/37997

Workaround 1: wait build finished and press "Debug anyway".
Workaround 2: change [task.json](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.vscode/tasks.json) version to 2.0.0 to run the build task in terminal.
title: 'The preLaunchTask 'xxxx' cannot be tracked.' after update to VS Code 1.18.0
